text: Hi, I'm Francis the host of this show cooking with dog
[Konnichiwa!]
Let's get the ingredients for Hamburg steak, cut the onion in half.
Slice into the onion with the root end attached
Make cuts across the onion parallel to the cutting surface
Chop across the other cuts and mince well
Chop up the broccoli stalk and cut the flower parts into 1-inch pieces
Peel the Stalk and chop into bite-size [pieces]
Cut the steamed potato into four pieces
Cut the tomato in half, and slice it into half moons
Grate the Garlic clove
Let's fry the chopped onion. Heat olive oil in a frying pan
Fry the onion for [2] to [3] minutes at high heat
Stir 5 to 6 minutes until colored at medium heat
remove and
Let the onion cool on a plate. Let's cook the vegetable side dish
heat olive oil in a pan
Fry the broccoli and the potato at high heat until [browned]
{Add] Salt
and the pepper
Sprinkle on some water
Put a lid on to steam and fry the vegetables for two to three minutes
remove the Lid and
stir the [vegetables]
Toss the [pan] to cook evenly and place the vegetables on a [plate]
serve the tomato
Broccoli
And potato on a plate. Let's make the meat mixture for Hamburg steak [add]
milk to the Breadcrumbs
season the meat Mixture with salt
pepper and
[nutmeg]
Kneed the meat mixture in a [bowl] until a bit gooey
add 2/3 of the fried onion and bread crumbs to the mixture
Crack the egg into a bowl and add to the mixture
knead the Mixture thoroughly
clean your fingers and
divide the mixture in half
wash your hands and
Pour some oil onto them
Shape the meat mixture into a Bowl
[toss] from one hand to the other and remove the air inside
Shape it into an oval and indent the center part
Repeat the process to shape another meatball, if the meat mixture is too soft to shape
Let it cool down in a fridge
Let's fry the hamburg steak, heat olive oil in a pan
Lightly press on the meat and make a dent in the center this will reduce the cooking time
rotate the meat with the spatula to cook evenly
Cook them until they're golden brown on the bottom
flip them over and [fry] the other [sides] evenly
if there is too much oil in the pan, remove with a paper towel. Add
measured water and
cover
Steam and fry until the water has evaporated
almost completely
[Pierce] the meat to check that its juice is clear and serve the hamburg steak on the plate
Let's make onion gravy, add water
Soy Sauce and
[Mirin] to the Pan
put the remaining fried onion in the pan and cook at medium heat when starts to boil, add butter and
grated garlic
Stir lightly
when the butter is dissolved,
Turn off the burner
Pour the onion gravy onto the hamburg steak
The onion gravy flavored with the soy sauce and butter goes great with steamed rice
Ponzu Sauce is also [a] great match adding a little zest to the dish
Garnish with [a] shiso leaf and grated Daikon radish.
This recipe is a very popular along with the various kinds of sources such as [demi glace]
mushroom and grated Daikon Ponzu sauce good luck in the kitchen!
